worklogs.comment:
fsaintjacques commented on pull request #4512: ARROW-5544: [Archery] don't return non-zero on regressions
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4512
 
 
   The return code should be used to return when the command did not
   execute successfully. In this case, the command did run without issues,
   we leave to the calling user to decide what to do with the data.
   
   This will simplify integration with ursabot CI.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: When a regression is detected, but the command ran successfully, it should return zero. Currently it returns the number of regression. This is to play better with ursabot. It should be left to the user to decide what to do with the json data.
fields.summary: [Archery] should not return non-zero in `benchmark diff` sub command on regression
